conversations.value:
Transcript 1: Bhavna Gupta

Q. Hello ma’am. Can you start with introducing yourself? 

A. Hi! I’m Bhavna, born and brought up in Delhi. I’m working as a business analyst at EXL service in Gurgaon.
Q. So the first question to you is which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?

A. I prefer to shop online as it’s quite convenient and saves a lot of time.
Q. And what are the type of products that you generally buy online/offline ?

A. Usually apparels like dresses, tops and denims. I love different and new clothes.
Q. What is the purchase frequency for your apparel purchases?

A. My purchase frequency for apparels is like 2-3 items every quarter.
Q. What type of apparel you love to purchase more frequently?

A. Most frequently I buy dresses that are trendy and good looking.
Q. What do you prefer while buying - online or offline? What parameters do you look at while buying ?

A. I prefer to buy online as it’s hassle free. The parameters I consider are delivery time, quality of products and return policy.
Q. Do you see prices online while buying offline or vice versa for comparison?

A. No I don’t
Q. What factors influence your decision for an apparel purchase?

A. Factors for apparel purchase will include quality of product, fit of the product, fabric used. These must tick all the boxes for me. 

Interviewer: Thanks a lot Bhavna for giving us your time. This will really help us with our research.

Bhavna: You’re welcome. 


Transcript 2: Shubham Aggarwal
Q. Hello sir. Please introduce yourself.

A. My name is Shubham Aggarwal and I am from Delhi. Currently I am working as Senior Risk analyst in insurance service firm located out of Gurgaon.
Q. So, I believe you shop a lot. My first question to you is which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?

A. I prefer both online and offline mode for shopping apparels. It depends on time availability for me.
Q. And what are the type of products that you generally buy online/offline ?

A. I buy comfort clothing like T shirts and pyjamas through online mode, while i buy casual wear or other high end apparels offline from trusted brands.

Q. What is the purchase frequency for your apparel purchases?

A. Generally I shop 3 to 4 times annually for season clothing but occasion/event specific shopping is also there during the year.

Q. What type of apparel you love to purchase more frequently?

A. I buy comfort clothing like T shirts and pyjamas more frequently as mostly i am at home due to hybrid working conditions
Q. What do you prefer while buying - online or offline? What parameters do you look at while buying ?

A. While buying online for comfort clothing main lookout is the price. I have some preferred brands for online shopping from where i do most online shopping. 
For offline shopping i mostly go with some different style and fashion. I lookout for quality and comfort while shopping offline while price factor is not so significant
Q. Do you see prices online while buying offline or vice versa for comparison?

A. No I don't indulge in price comparison in online or offline shopping. I only stick to my preferred factors without any comparison
Q. What factors influence your decision for an apparel purchase?

A. For an apparel purchase first factor would be need. Only if I feel extreme need to shop , I will shop. After that a combination of price, quality and brand plays main role in making my buying decision. 
Interviewer: Thank you so much Shubham for your valuable time. Your insights will definitely help us in our research project.

Shubham: Anytime. Pleasure is mine.

Transcript 3: Ritu Rao Patibandla 

Q. Hello ma’am. Can you please introduce yourself?

A. I am Ritu Rao Patibandla, Currently I am working as a Management trainee at ICICI Bank in their service sector group.
Q. So I would like to start this conversation by asking you which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?

A. Both. I buy clothes from wherever I find something unique and ‘value for money’. Be it a rise-door showroom or one of the e-retail platforms.
Q. What type of products do you generally buy online/offline ?

A. Apparels, grocery and electronics. These are my regular purchases.
Q. What is the purchase frequency for your apparel purchases?

A. 4-5 times a month. I like to shop a lot. Thrift shopping lets me explore many things.
Q. What type of apparel you love to purchase more frequently?

A. Casual wear and party wear including dresses, gowns and accessories.
Q. What do you prefer while buying - online or offline? What parameters do you look at while buying ?

A. Offline as it helps me in ensuring that the product is genuine and tested before making the purchase. Product analysis and shopping experience are quite important for me.
Q. Do you see prices online while buying offline or vice versa for comparison?

A. Yes, I do that sometimes to compare price differences for similar products.
Q. What factors influence your decision for an apparel purchase?

A. Cloth material, trust on the brand, quality , past experience. I usually checklist these factors while purchasing a product. 
Interviewer: Thanks Ritu. Your responses will help us in a better analysis.

Ritu: Welcome. Do reach out if you have any more questions.


Transcript 4: Dolly Vijay

Q. Hello ma’am. Can you start with introducing yourself? 

A. My name’s Dolly and I’m from New Delhi. I work as a Quality Associate at Amazon.

Q. So the first question to you is which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?

A. I prefer to shop online.

Q. And what are the type of products that you generally buy online/offline ?

A. The products which I buy most often online are clothes and I prefer buying electronics offline.

Q. What is the purchase frequency for your apparel purchases?

A. The frequency of shopping mostly depends on personal preferences and changing fashion. I do it once every 2 to 3 months..

Q. What type of apparel you love to purchase more frequently?

A. I like wearing one pieces, baggy jeans, sweaters, hoodies etc, the goal is to be able to dress for any occasion, any season, any reason with less effort.

Q. What do you prefer while buying - online or offline? What parameters do you look at while buying ?

A. I prefer buying online because there are too many options available and apps offer huge discounts too.

Q. Do you see prices online while buying offline or vice versa for comparison?

A. Yes, I do check the prices

Q. What factors influence your decision for an apparel purchase?

A. Price, quality and how trendy the product is

Interviewer: Thanks a lot Dolly for giving us your time. This will really help us with our research.

Dolly: You’re welcome. 
Transcript 5: Lakshay Gulati
Q. Hello sir. Please introduce yourself.

A. I am Lakshay, an MBA student in first year pursing Marketing at IMT ghaziabad

Q. So, I believe you shop a lot. My first question to you is which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?

A. I usually prefer online mode of shopping unless buying a luxury item for which feel is very important.

Q. And what are the type of products that you generally buy online/offline ?

A. I usually buy clothes and skin care products through online channels

Q. What is the purchase frequency for your apparel purchases?

A. I buy an apparel item almost every 2 weeks

Q. What type of apparel you love to purchase more frequently?

A. I love to buy streetwear Tshirts every once and now cos they're not that expensive and allows me to fulfil my shopping desire.

Q. What do you prefer while buying - online or offline? What parameters do you look at while buying ?

A. I prefer Online only cos of the insane variety it offers sitting at home. I can have access to every brand and every item of the brand unlike different stores has different apparels stock.

Q. Do you see prices online while buying offline or vice versa for comparison?

A. No, I consider the MRP stays the same for online/offline while Online offers some major discounts all over the year.

Q. What factors influence your decision for an apparel purchase?

A. Price, design, delivery charge, return policy are the factors I see to purchase the apparel

Interviewer: Thank you so much Lakshay for your valuable time. Your insights will definitely help us in our research project.

Lakshay: Anytime. Pleasure is mine.

Transcript 6: Saloni Narangg 

Q. Hello ma’am. Can you please introduce yourself?

A. I am Saloni Narang from Gurgaon, Haryana. Currently pursuing my masters degree from NMIMS Mumbai..

Q. So I would like to start this conversation by asking you which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?

A. I prefer both depending on the type of purchase and occasion for purchase. For regular, western wear, I generally go for Online channels and for ethnic wear & party wear, I tend to go for offline channel.

Q. What type of products do you generally buy online/offline ?

A. For regular, western wear, I generally go for Online channels and for ethnic wear & party wear, I tend to go for offline channel

Q. What is the purchase frequency for your apparel purchases?

A. I generally purchase apparels including tops, dresses, T-shirts almost every month using online channels. Ethnic/party wear, only when situation demands me to buy those clothes.

Q. What type of apparel you love to purchase more frequently?

A. I generally purchase t-shirts, tops, dresses, etc. more often.
Q. What do you prefer while buying - online or offline? What parameters do you look at while buying ?

A. I prefer online mode dưe to the Ease of buying, availability of choices, ease of comparison and that there is no hassle of going to different stores, etc. Quality factor is taken care of because of easy return/exchange options available

Q. Do you see prices online while buying offline or vice versa for comparison?

A. I look at price and quality of clothes while buying expensive clothes (mostly ethnic/party wear)

Q. What factors influence your decision for an apparel purchase?

A. Factors that influence my purchase decisions include Brand, quality, fit, style, type of cloth, price.

Interviewer: Thanks Saloni. Your responses will help us in a better analysis.

Saloni: Welcome. Do reach out if you have any more questions.

Transcript 7
Introduce yourself (Basic intro of respondent and demographics)
1. I am Indranil and I hail from Kolkata, West Bengal. Currently I am a employed with Exide

Which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?
2. I prefer offline since I find it more convenient

What type of products do you generally buy online/offline?
3. I mostly purchase apparels, food and books online. Other products are purchased offline by me

What is the purchase frequency for your apparel purchases?
4. I generally tend to purchase apparels every alternate month. Sometimes, I also purchase them based on the need

What type of apparel you love to purchase more frequently?
5. I read the reviews of the product, the brand, price and delivery timelines before purchasing the product

Why do you prefer while buying - online or offline? What parameters do you look at while buying?
6. I prefer online for lower value items while prefer offline for items that are of high value
Do you see prices online while buying offline or vice versa for comparison?
7. I always see the prices while buying products online and compare them. I switch the channel if the product is available at a lower price
What factors influence your decision for an apparel purchase?
8. Brand, Price, Product Quality, Delivery Date



Transcript 8
Introduce yourself (Basic intro of respondent and demographics)
1. I am Yash and I hail from Mumbai, Maharashtra. Currently I am a posted as a Consultant with PwC India

Which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?
2. I purchase most of my products online as it is more convenient

What type of products do you generally buy online/offline?
3. I buy groceries, apparel, low priced electronics and online. For higher priced products I prefer offline
What is the purchase frequency for your apparel purchases?
4. I purchase apparels once a month
What type of apparel you love to purchase more frequently?
5. I purchase shirts and jeans frequently as they are required by me the most and can be easily determined online
Why do you prefer while buying - online or offline? What parameters do you look at while buying?
6. I prefer online due to its convenience and lower prices than offline stores
Do you see prices online while buying offline or vice versa for comparison?
7. If the product is available at a long delivery date, then I purchase the product offline if the price difference is not much high
What factors influence your decision for an apparel purchase?
8. Price, Product Quality, Delivery Date, Reviews, Customer Support



Transcript 9

Introduce yourself (Basic intro of respondent and demographics)
1. I am Rana and I hail from Kolkata, West Bengal. Currently I am a posted as a Consultant with Deloitte USI

Which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?
2. Mostly online as I prefer convenience 

What type of products do you generally buy online/offline?
3. Apparel or daily goods from online And electronics or any other items offline 

What is the purchase frequency for your apparel purchases?
4. I generally tend to purchase apparels based on the season

What type of apparel you love to purchase more frequently?
5. The parameters that I look while purchasing is how early I receive the product, the reviews of product, feel and touch of the product, maximum discounts and the return policy 

Why do you prefer while buying - online or offline? What parameters do you look at while buying?
6. I prefer online for lower value items while prefer offline for items that are of high value
Do you see prices online while buying offline or vice versa for comparison?
7. Yes I see the prices online and use them for my comparison. I purchase the lowest one

What factors influence your decision for an apparel purchase?
8. Price, delivery date, exchange/repair policy

Transcript 5: Suresh Kumar

Q: Hi, can you please introduce yourself?

A: Hello, my name is Suresh Kumar. I am a software engineer and I live in Bangalore, India.

Q: Thanks, Suresh. So, the first question for you is which channel do you prefer while shopping for apparel, offline or online?

A: I prefer to shop online for most of my clothing purchases.

Q: And what type of products do you generally buy online/offline?

A: I buy a variety of products online, from clothes to electronics. However, for things like shoes, I prefer to buy them in a physical store to ensure the fit is right.

Q: What is the frequency of your apparel purchases?

A: I would say I buy new clothes around once a month or so.

Q: What type of apparel do you love to purchase more frequently?

A: I really like buying comfortable and stylish t-shirts.

Q: What do you look for while buying, online or offline? What are the main factors that influence your purchase decision?

A: When shopping online, I pay attention to the fit of the clothing, the reviews of the product, and the return policy. When shopping in person, I focus more on the feel of the material and the quality of the item.

Q: Do you compare prices online while shopping in physical stores?

A: I do sometimes, but not always. If I'm in a store and I see something that I like, I might look it up online to see if I can find a better price.

Q: What factors influence your decision to purchase apparel?

A: Comfort, style, fit, and price are the most important factors for me when deciding whether or not to purchase an item of clothing.

Interviewer: Thank you, Suresh, for sharing your insights on your shopping habits with us.

Suresh: My pleasure.
